name: judge-frontend

scripts.build-js: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] browser/main.js -o public/js/bundle.js
scripts.watch-js: watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] browser/main.js -o public/js/bundle.js -dv
scripts.start-dev: export NODE_ENV=development && npm run watch-js & node ./bin/www

description: Frontend Service for UTPJudge project, it aims to deliver a responsive user interface for programming contests, it will use the [RESTful API](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Representational_state_transfer) provided by the [judge-backend](https://github.com/in-silico/judge-backend) to get the judging done.
author: in-silico
